name: 2, 4, 6 Custard
description:
Sometimes simple is best.........

A deliciously easy vanilla custard designed to showcase the beauty that is FA custard premium. 

Feel free to add whatever sweetener you like as a small amount only improves it. I like to use 2% EM 10% and .25% super sweet. 

Deliciously rich and creamy true to life custard. 

Give it at least 2 weeks to steep, 4 if you've got the will power. 

Edit....... Add 1.5% fw yellow cake and 1% fa meringue for an added boost of richness.
author: MCrane81
